title: suggestion - on my way pings in chat
body: in the same way missing and danger pings appear in chat showing who pinged it, do this to on my way pings too. this way you know who is coming to help you and based off this information make a decision

replies.body: I read somewhere that in the coming updates, Riot plans on adding new features to the on my way pings such as who is pinging it and also the distance from how far away the person is (near, very near, very far) etc. In the same post I also recall them announcing that there will just be more QOL improvements in general
i didnt know this. thank you
